DOC.brief_summary: Purpose: This study is a Randomized, Double Blind, Multi-center, Active Drug Controlled, Phase III Clinical Trial to Compare the Safety and Efficacy of DWP450 Versus Botox® in Treatment of Post Stroke Upper Limb(wrist, finger, elbow, thumb)Spasticity.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized, Double Blind, Multi-center, Active Drug Controlled, Phase III Clinical Trial to Compare the Safety and Efficacy of DWP450 Versus Botox® in Treatment of Post Stroke Upper Limb Spasticity
DOC.criteria: 1. Male or female adult patients 2. ≥ 6 weeks since the last stroke 1.Patients with diagnosed neuromuscular disorders such as LamberEaton syndrome, myasthenia gravis, or amyotrophic lateral sclerosis.
